memberdef.definition: typedef GraphType:: template EdgeMap<uint8_t> nifty::graph::opt::multicut::Cgc< OBJECTIVE >::IsDirtyEdge
memberdef.name: IsDirtyEdge

briefdescription.para: Inform solver about a change of weights.

detaileddescription.para: Inform solver that all weights could have changed. If a particular solver does not overload this function, an WeightsChangedNotSupported exception is thrown. After a call of this function it is save to run optimize again, therefore it resets the solver
